mapper.select: SELECT A.STANDARD_ID AS standardId FROM PD_STANDARD AS A WHERE A.CLASSESTREE_CODE = #{filterMap.classestreeCode}

SELECT STANDARD_ID AS standardId, FED_STD_ITEM_ID AS fedStdItemId, FED_GOOD_VAL_FILE1 AS fGoodValFile1, FED_GOOD_VAL_FILETYPE1 AS fedGoodValFileType1, FED_GOOD_VAL_FILE2 AS fGoodValFile2, FED_GOOD_VAL_FILETYPE2 AS fedGoodValFileType2, FED_GOOD_VAL_FILE3 AS fGoodValFile3, FED_GOOD_VAL_FILETYPE3 AS fedGoodValFileType3, FED_GOOD_VAL_FILE4 AS fGoodValFile4, FED_GOOD_VAL_FILETYPE4 AS fedGoodValFileType4, FED_NORMAL_VAL_FILE1 AS fNormalValFile1, FED_NORMAL_VAL_FILETYPE1 AS fedNormalValFileType1, FED_NORMAL_VAL_FILE2 AS fNormalValFile2, FED_NORMAL_VAL_FILETYPE2 AS fedNormalValFileType2, FED_NORMAL_VAL_FILE3 AS fNormalValFile3, FED_NORMAL_VAL_FILETYPE3 AS fedNormalValFileType3, FED_NORMAL_VAL_FILE4 AS fNormalValFile4, FED_NORMAL_VAL_FILETYPE4 AS fedNormalValFileType4, FED_BAD_VAL_FILE1 AS fBadValFile1, FED_BAD_VAL_FILETYPE1 AS fedBadValFileType1, FED_BAD_VAL_FILE2 AS fBadValFile2, FED_BAD_VAL_FILETYPE2 AS fedBadValFileType2, FED_BAD_VAL_FILE3 AS fBadValFile3, FED_BAD_VAL_FILETYPE3 AS fedBadValFileType3, FED_BAD_VAL_FILE4 AS fBadValFile4, FED_BAD_VAL_FILETYPE4 AS fedBadValFileType4 FROM pd_fed_std_img WHERE STANDARD_ID = #{filterMap.standardId} AND FED_STD_ITEM_ID =#{filterMap.fedStdItemId}

SELECT A.FED_STD_ITEM_ID AS fedStdItemId, B.FED_STD_ITEM_NAME AS fedStdItemName, A.FED_GOOD_VAL AS fedGoodVal, A.FED_NORMAL_VAL AS fedNormalVal, A.FED_BAD_VAL AS fedBadVal, C.FED_GOOD_VAL_FILE1 AS fGoodValFile1, C.FED_GOOD_VAL_FILETYPE1 AS fedGoodValFileType1, C.FED_GOOD_VAL_FILE2 AS fGoodValFile2, C.FED_GOOD_VAL_FILETYPE2 AS fedGoodValFileType2, C.FED_GOOD_VAL_FILE3 AS fGoodValFile3, C.FED_GOOD_VAL_FILETYPE3 AS fedGoodValFileType3, C.FED_GOOD_VAL_FILE4 AS fGoodValFile4, C.FED_GOOD_VAL_FILETYPE4 AS fedGoodValFileType4, C.FED_NORMAL_VAL_FILE1 AS fNormalValFile1, C.FED_NORMAL_VAL_FILETYPE1 AS fedNormalValFileType1, C.FED_NORMAL_VAL_FILE2 AS fNormalValFile2, C.FED_NORMAL_VAL_FILETYPE2 AS fedNormalValFileType2, C.FED_NORMAL_VAL_FILE3 AS fNormalValFile3, C.FED_NORMAL_VAL_FILETYPE3 AS fedNormalValFileType3, C.FED_NORMAL_VAL_FILE4 AS fNormalValFile4, C.FED_NORMAL_VAL_FILETYPE4 AS fedNormalValFileType4, C.FED_BAD_VAL_FILE1 AS fBadValFile1, C.FED_BAD_VAL_FILETYPE1 AS fedBadValFileType1, C.FED_BAD_VAL_FILE2 AS fBadValFile2, C.FED_BAD_VAL_FILETYPE2 AS fedBadValFileType2, C.FED_BAD_VAL_FILE3 AS fBadValFile3, C.FED_BAD_VAL_FILETYPE3 AS fedBadValFileType3, C.FED_BAD_VAL_FILE4 AS fBadValFile4, C.FED_BAD_VAL_FILETYPE4 AS fedBadValFileType4 FROM PD_FED_STD AS A LEFT JOIN PD_FED_STD_ITEM AS B ON A.FED_STD_ITEM_ID = B.FED_STD_ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN pd_fed_std_img AS C ON A.STANDARD_ID = C.STANDARD_ID AND A.FED_STD_ITEM_ID = C.FED_STD_ITEM_ID WHERE A.STANDARD_ID = #{filterMap.standardId} ORDER BY A.FED_STD_ITEM_ID
SELECT A.FED_STD_ITEM_ID AS fedStdItemId ,A.FED_STD_ITEM_NAME AS fedStdItemName FROM PD_FED_STD_ITEM AS A ORDER BY A.FED_STD_ITEM_ID
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PD_FED_STD ( STANDARD_ID, FED_STD_ITEM_ID, FED_GOOD_VAL, FED_NORMAL_VAL, FED_BAD_VAL, REMARK, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, VER) VALUES( #{standardId}, #{fedStdItemId}, #{fedGoodVal}, #{fedNormalVal}, #{fedBadVal}, NULL, '0',
#{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{updId}, #{updTime},
#{actId},
#{actTime},
'1' );
mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL_NAME AS featureNames FROM PD_CLASSESTREE WHERE PARENT_CODE = #{filterMap.classestreeCode} ORDER BY LEVEL_CODE
